html:
11.4.19  8:12 pm   do you sometimes feel tired of life?

     no

      how 2 remedy this?

     build some new towns

11.4.19  8:07 pm   Which type of cereal goes best on whole grain bread?

     frosted cheerios

11.4.19  8:01 pm   WHY AM I HERE?

     that's the definition of 'here.' it means where you are

11.4.19  7:37 pm   I just did a bad thing what do I do?

     hold a press conference

11.4.19  7:08 pm   do you pour in milk and then cereal or cereal and than milk?

     thanks to modern technology, we can now pour the bowl into the cereal, on top of the milk

11.4.19  7:03 pm   Should I force my straight friend to be gay with me

     sure

11.4.19  6:45 pm   What is your Meyers-Brigg personality type

     meyers

11.4.19  6:30 pm   hey bill i miss you when are u coming back from war

     going to stay in it until i start winning

11.4.19  6:27 pm   i have missed your videos on youtube,

     i'm pretty sure they are still there, just check youtube.com/billwurtz

      but i hope that you are doing well! now that the year is coming closer to an end, have you had a good 2019?

     pivotal

11.4.19  6:22 pm   opinions on the sun?

     could come in handy

11.4.19  6:09 pm   So, what you're saying is that music is totally worthless unless it's paired with some type of visual content?

     not visual, just anything the brain can identify as something

11.4.19  5:34 pm   any hot secret tips on how to possibly live forever? 

     ~~ sure ~~

11.4.19  4:56 pm   is it a safe bet to get into the technology business right now

     it's always the safest bet if you have an amazing product or service

      or will Google soon become an AI to control us all?

     when ai reaches maturity it will be wiser than all of us combined. there will probably be a lot to learn from it. being so much stronger and more competent than us, it's hard to see any benefit it could gain from controlling us

11.4.19  4:34 pm   Yo bill I hear your working on something big could we get a sneak peek?

     yes

11.4.19  4:02 pm   why did u write hello sexy pants?

     i wrote the 1st couple of lines because i enjoy songwriting and coming up with song ideas. then later i fixed up those lines, because i enjoy songwriting and making song ideas better. then i finished the song so i could record it, and show off the song so you can hear it

11.4.19  3:49 pm   wait so I can't know what a note by just hearing it but I can hear the relationship between notes and figure it out if I know one?

     that sounds about right. unless the plain absolute pitches actually meant something to you at an extremely young age

      also can I write music by just throwing notes together and waiting until something sounds good???

     well the thing about music, is it actually has to be anchored to the material world somehow, maybe via words, persons, or various other contextual identifiers. those identifyable elements will be extremely juiced by the music, but if the identifiers weren't there there would be hardly anything to juice. it would just be juice puddles

11.4.19  3:47 pm   What is the purpose of this site?

     it's good to have at least one site on the internet that can actually load a page and have it stay still long enough to read it, instead of choking to death on cookies and various other complicated pastries

11.4.19  3:34 pm   Do you believe governments should disarm themselves from Nuclear armament? 

     it's kind of like a game of chicken. whoever is the last one to disarm will suddenly rule the world

11.4.19  3:29 pm   Did the days have gone by?

     yes, get ready for more

11.4.19  3:00 pm   How Old Are you and Are you a hoe? Or shovel

     all 3

11.4.19  1:33 pm   how do i give the most kick-ass powerpoint presentation to ever exist in the history of mankind?

     just start making a lot of presentations, and i think you will naturally discover that you will get bored unless you make them kick ass

11.4.19  1:03 pm   why are trombones the BEST instrument??

     because they can slide in between notes, for a full range of pitch

11.4.19  12:52 pm   can i submit riddle for you to solve here?

     i can't even seem to solve this one

11.4.19  12:51 pm   how could anyone speak seventeen fucking languages 

     you just have to learn them. it's like learning games, each one is like a game

11.4.19  12:47 pm   Two questions of the same caliber:
1. When people told you that you can't make things for the rest of your life/ told you to get a real job, did you ever hear that less than 1% of people are successful?

     i didn't actually start making things the way i do now until i had already had multiple jobs, of varying degrees of real and fakeness

      2. When did you realize that they were completely and utterly wrong?
Also was that the best gosh darn feeling ever?

11.4.19  12:07 pm   Will you ever make a video reading these questions?

     no. well, maybe

11.4.19  10:58 am   Any facts about television?

     the television is on the computer now. and the computer is on the television. that's just the will of mother nature

11.4.19  10:22 am   Is nasa hiding aliens

     they've been in space for so long now they're the aliens

11.4.19  10:08 am   what are your thoughts on goods and services

     they are all available at the Goods And Services station (GAS station)

11.4.19  10:07 am   how many umbreallas do you own

     1

11.4.19  9:30 am   Sometimes I come look at these questions and your answers just to look at your wisdom. How do I get as wise as you?

     it helps to become older at a seemingly unstoppable rate

      Let me guess, your answer will be to read books?

     well no, i'm not THAT old. i've always done my reading on computers. there's extremely more content on there, and sometimes you can even see the person actually talking, so it's a chance to absorb thoughts and feelings even more vividly, from all over the world. this is the kind of thing people would only DREAM of doing, in the age of books

11.4.19  9:29 am   What's a good resource to start learning functional harmony?

     just start listening to music and find out which parts are functioning properly by listening to see which parts give you the FEELS

11.4.19  9:03 am   How do I sleep in school

     first you have to become the principal

11.4.19  8:50 am   school's in full swing, but i think i might quit. i really just don't enjoy it here anymore. some friends help, in the same way as having a preserver in the middle of the ocean. should i just jump off a tall building or something

     you could accomplish the same effect by going to the top of a tall building and climbing down the stairs really quickly

11.4.19  8:37 am   What has happened to my life?

     it's becoming very interesting

11.4.19  8:30 am   is november too early to celebrate christmas

     no

11.4.19  8:19 am   do you consider you listen to classical music?

     i could

      If so which composers?

     mozart

      and why ?

     rock solid. money in the bank

11.4.19  7:39 am   i have a relatively good singing voice naturally, but when i learn to sing a song i just memorize the lyrics, tempo, and rhythm, and then i learn the melody. but i dont know what the actual notes are that im singing, i just copy the singer. is this bad?

     it's fine unless you have to do a song that was written in the past and has no existing recording and the writer is not available for consultation

11.4.19  7:06 am   thoughts on grammar ray radiaton

     seems legit

11.4.19  6:37 am   Is cheddar cheese cheese or is it cheese that is more cheesier

     it ranks a high 7.2 on the cheese index, of cheese

11.4.19  6:25 am   can I buy a Bill Wurtz vinyl record or nah?

     no

11.4.19  6:05 am   what kind of car do you have

     garbage car. it's like a garbage truck, but the car version

11.4.19  6:03 am   do birds have fun ?

     i must admit, yes

11.4.19  5:53 am   do you think speedrunning is cool? 

     yes. running at an average pace is also a good second choice

11.4.19  5:36 am   what question do you get asked the most on here?

     this one

11.4.19  5:16 am   why do i suck?

     could be due to your virtues and character strengths

11.4.19  4:20 am   how do i get through the stress of school

     it's probably more fun if you teach

11.4.19  2:47 am   parents are about to cut me off financially. shit could get... troublesome. a lot of the things i want, i cannot currently afford. time to make money. but oh my god, EVERYONE is out here trying to do that. talk about a crowded racket. never been so intimidated in my life. i've got the skills, but they've never paid the bills before. i just need some type of megaphone so people know im here. any tips bill

     sometimes in those situations i like to imagine the simplicity of life 1000 years ago where all you had to do was keep punching the ground until food comes out of it

11.4.19  1:34 am   did u clean ur room?

     partially

11.4.19  12:08 am   Do you believe more musical artists should release sheet music of their original pieces? 

     not sure who can really read that stuff anymore
